verb - to chin someone

originally a boxing term. refers to the resilience a fighter has, especially in regard to blows to the head.someone who cannot handle getting hit in a fight very well is said to have a weak chin or a glass jaw. someone who can handle lots of abuse is said to have a strong chin.
